mapper.sql: MENU_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, MENU_NM, UPP_MENU_ID, MENU_LVL, FILE_PATH, FILE_NM, DISP_YN, DISP_ORD, MNGR_MENU_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID

SELECT MENU_ID , EXP_DTM , STR_DTM , MENU_NM , UPP_MENU_ID , MENU_LVL , FILE_PATH , FILE_NM , DISP_YN , DISP_ORD , MNGR_MENU_YN , IMG_PATH , MENU_DCD , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , WRIT_DTM , WRIT_USER_ID , FULL_PATH , UPP_MENU_ID||MENU_ID AS ORDER_COLUMN FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU WHERE MENU_LVL = #{item} AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
mapper.select:
SELECT A.MENU_ID , A.EXP_DTM , A.STR_DTM , A.MENU_NM , A.UPP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_LVL , A.FILE_PATH , A.FILE_NM , A.DISP_YN , A.DISP_ORD , A.MNGR_MENU_YN , A.IMG_PATH , A.MENU_DCD , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.WRIT_DTM , A.WRIT_USER_ID , A.FULL_PATH , B.MENU_NM AS UPP_MENU_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.WRIT_USER_ID) AS WRIT_USER_NM FROM V_WAA_PRGM_MENU
A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_PRGM_MENU B ON A.UPP_MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')
AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{menuNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%' )
AND A.MENU_DCD = #{menuDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY A.MENU_DCD DESC , A.FULL_DISP_ORD , A.MENU_LVL
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAA_PRGM_MENU A SET FULL_PATH = (SELECT FULL_PATH FROM V_WAA_PRGM_MENU B
WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ) ,FULL_PATH_EN = (SELECT FULL_PATH_EN FROM V_WAA_PRGM_MENU B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,B.MENU_NM AS UPP_MENU_NM FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_PRGM_MENU B ON A.UPP_MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE 1=1 AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE WAA_PRGM_MENU SET EXP_DTM = now() WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId} AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
insert into COMTNMENUINFO
MENU_NO,
MENU_NM,
PROGRM_FILE_NM,
UPPER_MENU_NO,
MENU_ORDR,
MENU_DC,
RELATE_IMAGE_PATH,
RELATE_IMAGE_NM,
#{menuNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{menuNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{progrmFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{upperMenuNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{menuOrdr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{menuDc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relateImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relateImageNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNMENUINFO SET MENU_NM = #{menuNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{progrmFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPER_MENU_NO = #{upperMenuNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_ORDR = #{menuOrdr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MENU_DC = #{menuDc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATE_IMAGE_PATH = #{relateImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATE_IMAGE_NM = #{relateImageNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--메뉴접속통계 SELECT
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1) AS statsDate
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) AS statsDate
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, B.MENU_NO AS menuNo , B.MENUPATH AS menuPath , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , IFNULL(COUNT(A.OCCRRNC_DE),0) AS statsCo FROM COMTNWEBLOG A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.FILE_NM AS PROGRM_FILE_NM , B.URL , A.FULL_PATH AS MENUPATH , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_NO FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU A
INNER JOIN COMTNPROGRMLIST B ON A.FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY A.DISP_ORD, MENU_NM ) B ON A.URL LIKE CONCAT( '%',B.URL,'%') WHERE 1=1
AND A.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1) DESC, B.MENU_NO
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) DESC, B.MENU_NO
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) DESC, B.MENU_NO

--사용자별 메뉴접속통계 SELECT
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1) AS statsDate
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) AS statsDate
SUBSTR(A.OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, B.MENU_NO AS menuNo , B.MENUPATH AS menuPath , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , A.RQESTER_ID AS loginId , C.USER_NM AS loginNm , IFNULL(COUNT(A.OCCRRNC_DE),0) AS statsCo FROM COMTNWEBLOG A INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.FILE_NM AS PROGRM_FILE_NM , B.URL , A.FULL_PATH AS MENUPATH , A.MENU_ID AS MENU_NO FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU A
INNER JOIN COMTNPROGRMLIST B ON A.FILE_NM = B.PROGRM_FILE_NM WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY A.DISP_ORD, MENU_NM ) B ON A.URL LIKE CONCAT('%',B.URL,'%') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER C ON A.RQESTER_ID = C.USER_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') WHERE 1=1
AND A.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM , A.RQESTER_ID , C.USER_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1) DESC, B.MENU_NO
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM , A.RQESTER_ID , C.USER_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 6) DESC, B.MENU_NO
GROUP BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) , B.MENU_NO , B.MENUPATH , B.PROGRM_FILE_NM , A.RQESTER_ID , C.USER_NM ORDER BY SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) DESC, B.MENU_NO
